org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.infinispan.persistencestrategy.impl

Class LocalCacheManager<EK,AK,ISK>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.infinispan.persistencestrategy.impl.LocalCacheManager<EK,AK,ISK>
  • Type Parameters:
    EK - the entity cache key type
    AK - the association cache key type
    ISK - the identity source cache key type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OnePerKindCacheManager, PerTableCacheManager

    public abstract class LocalCacheManager<EK,AK,ISK>
extends Object
    Provides access to the ISPN caches used for storing entities, associations and id sources. The number of caches used depends on the specific implementation of this contract.

    Implementations need to make sure all needed caches are started before state transfer happens. This prevents this node to return undefined cache errors during replication when other nodes join this one.

    Implementations must be thread-safe.

    Author:
    Sanne Grinovero, Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>, Gunnar Morling
